tip.desc: Generations of artisans devoted their lives to crafting this gun. Only the best hunter deserves it.
Its sharp arrow casts a flash of faint cold light.
One of the most coveted weapons for its devastating power.
This machine gun once helped your antecedents kill hundreds of fierce dinosaurs in one war alone.
Who knows when the next famine will break out. Use this weapon to freeze dinosaurs for food reserves.
Just a glance at this cleaver sends shivers down your spine.
